showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:1}); // “Whoa!”{PAUSE}“Slow down, what's the hurry?
Why don't you stick around?
We'll treat you real nice!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // “Hey…you're in pretty good shape.
Lookit your tight little bod…”{PAUSE}“It's more like…muscles…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:7}); // “Oh your eyes.
They seem to…glow.
I'm all yours, baby!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // “Come on, dance with me, beautiful.
They say if two people dance
together, their hearts will
become one…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:9}); // “Come on, baby!”{PAUSE}“Woo-hoo! I gots ants in my pants
wanna do a dance,
gotta take a chance,
and mebbe find romance!”

dialogStrings: Corneo Hall,2f.

“Whoa!”{PAUSE}“Slow down, what's the hurry?
Why don't you stick around?
We'll treat you real nice!”

Scotch
“Hey guys!
We've got guests.”{PAUSE}“We'll take REAL
good care of you.”

Scotch
“This is all thanks
to the big boss, Don Corneo!”

“Heeey!!
Three cheers for Don Corneo!!”

Scotch
“Heh, heh…
Well ladies, are we all, uh, ready?”

“Hey…you're in pretty good shape.
Lookit your tight little bod…”{PAUSE}“It's more like…muscles…”

“Oh your eyes.
They seem to…glow.
I'm all yours, baby!”

“Come on, dance with me, beautiful.
They say if two people dance
together, their hearts will
become one…”

“Come on, baby!”{PAUSE}“Woo-hoo! I gots ants in my pants
wanna do a dance,
gotta take a chance,
and mebbe find romance!”

Scotch
“…leer…snicker…”

Scotch
“Hey…what's wrong?
You want me to
keep you company?”

{Cloud}
“I'm flattered,
but no thanks.”
“Because…”

Scotch
“Because?”

{Cloud}
“I ain't INTERESTED in
a buncha scrubs like you!!”

Scotch
“Wha…a MAN!???”

Scotch
“Goddamn it!
Don't think you'll get outta this!
Get him! Beat the *%#@ out of him!!”

Scotch
“Grr! C'mon, what's the matter
with you good-for-nothings!?”{PAUSE}“All right now, COME ON!
I'll show you how it's done!!”
Received "Phoenix Down"!
